genius.core.parties

Class AbstractNegotiationParty

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTimeDependentNegotiationParty, AcceptingNegotiationParty, Annealer, Annealer, BoaParty, ConsensusVotingHumanAgent, CounterOfferHumanNegotiationParty, EnumeratorParty, FeedbackHillClimber, FeedbackMediator, FeedbackParty, HillClimber, HillClimber, HillClimberMajorityVoting, MediatorHumanNegotiationParty, NegotiationEndingParty, RandomAmopParty, RandomCounterOfferNegotiationParty, RandomFiftyFiftyNegotiationParty, RandomFlippingMediator, RandomMajorityVoting, SmartMediatorOnlyFeedback, TimeoutNegotiationParty, UINegotiationParty, UncertaintyAgentExample

    public abstract class AbstractNegotiationParty
extends java.lang.Object
implements NegotiationParty
    A basic implementation of the NegotiationParty interface. This basic implementation sets up some common variables for you.
    Author:
    Tim Baarslag, David Festen, Reyhan (The random bid generator)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(NegotiationInfo info)
        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        Initializes the party, informing it of many negotiation details. This MUST be called exactly once, immediately after construction of any class implementing this.
        Specified by:
        init in interface NegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        info - information about the negotiation that this party is part of.

      • estimateUtilitySpace

        public AbstractUtilitySpace estimateUtilitySpace()
        Returns an estimate of the utility space given uncertain preferences specified by the user model. By default, the utility space is estimated with a simple counting heuristic so that any agent can deal with preference uncertainty. This method can be overridden by the agent to provide better estimates.

      • defaultUtilitySpaceEstimator

        public static AbstractUtilitySpace defaultUtilitySpaceEstimator(Domain domain,
                                                                UserModel um)
        Provides a simple estimate of a utility space given the partial preferences of a UserModel. This is constructed as a static funtion so that other agents (that are not an AbstractNegotiationParty) can also benfit from this functionality.

      • getDomain

        public Domain getDomain()
        Returns the domain defined in either the utilityspace or user model of the agent.

      • getUtility

        public double getUtility(Bid bid)
        Gets the utility for the given bid.
        Parameters:
        bid - The bid to get the utility for
        Returns:
        A double value between [0, 1] (inclusive) that represents the bids utility

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage(AgentID sender,
                           Action act)
        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        This method is called to inform the party that another NegotiationParty chose an Action.
        Specified by:
        receiveMessage in interface NegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        sender - The initiator of the action.This is either the AgentID, or null if the sender is not an agent (e.g., the protocol).
        act - The action performed

        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        Get the protocol that this party supports.

      • negotiationEnded

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> negotiationEnded(Bid acceptedBid)
        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        This is called to inform the agent that the negotiation has been ended. This allows the agent to record some final conclusions about the run.
        Specified by:
        negotiationEnded in interface NegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        acceptedBid - the final accepted bid, or null if no agreement was reached.
        Returns:
        Map containing data to log for this agent. null is equal to returning an empty HashMap. Typically, this info will be logged by XmlWriteStream.write(String, java.util.Map) to an XML file.
